blogPost.excerpt: Static pages are so last year!💥 Drive user engagement, improve their experience and navigation by 21%, and increase your conversion rate with vector animation of empty states and UI icons. Get our free animations and customize them to your app design 🌈
blogPost.body: Static pages are so last year!💥 Drive user engagement, improve their experience and navigation by 21%, and increase your conversion rate with vector animation of empty states and UI icons. Get our free animations and customize them to your app design 🌈
blogPost.title: Product UI Animations by Awesomic - Animated graphics and icons for web and mobile app design
blogPost.author: Roman Evans

localize.description: 静态页面是如此的去年！💥驱动用户参与，改善他们的体验和导航21％，并增加你的转换率与空状态和UI图标的矢量动画。获取我们的免费动画，并根据您的应用设计进行定制🌈。
localize.tagline: 用于网页和移动应用设计的动画图形和图标。

localize.description: 靜態頁面是如此的去年！💥驅動用戶參與，改善他們的體驗和導航21％，並增加你的轉換率與空狀態和UI圖標的矢量動畫。獲取我們的免費動畫，並根據您的應用設計進行定製🌈。
localize.tagline: 用於網頁和移動應用設計的動畫圖形和圖標。
